name: YHA Nelson
description:
Discover the vibrant heart of Nelson City with our unbeatable location, just steps away from great cafes, craft beer bars, shops, supermarkets, and next to Nelson's famous Saturday Market. Our hostel offers not only a comfortable and secure haven but also a gateway to unforgettable adventures in the Nelson Tasman Region.
What sets us apart? Our dedication to helping create great experiences for you! We are the only booking agent in town providing lots of free local information. We can advise and help you book Abel Tasman tours and transport, Intercity Bus, Interislander ferries, Wine Tours and much more. 
Explore Nelson's hidden gems with our help – from the best coffee spots to scenic walks, exhilarating kayak trips, refreshing swimming holes, and breathtaking views. 
Our City Bikes and fun E-Bikes are available for hire every day from reception. With over 100 kilometers of bike-friendly trails around Nelson, there is plenty to see.
Convenience is also at the core of your stay. The Intercity bus station is a short walk away and the Airport Bus stops just around the corner from us. All the tour operators and the early morning buses to the Abel Tasman National Park pick up from our Hostel for Kayak trips, Sailing, Canyoning, Water Taxis and walking trips.
Our hostel is a place where you can relax in comfort and security, with comfy rooms, fast, free WiFi and modern facilities. 
For the food enthusiasts, we have 2 well-equipped kitchens with plenty of space to cook your favorite meals. Fresh bread is delivered daily, accompanied by a selection of herbs and spices. Socialize in our modern, colorful dining area, or find a quiet spot in our lounge, complete with a reading area, book exchange, music space, and an enclosed TV Room boasting a vast library of movies.
But that's not all – our hostel has a range of other services and facilities that will enhance your stay. Enjoy a relaxing sauna, internal bike storage, musical instruments (guitar, ukulele and piano) board games, foosball and sports equipment.  
We offer late check-ins, CCTV security monitoring, free in-room lockers, laundry facilities, towel hire, and printing services. 
If you are heading off on a multiday trip we have Luggage Storage available while you are away. We also have the best value camping gear hire in Nelson including tents, cooker sets and more.
Stay with us and our friendly team will help you experience the best of Nelson City and the surrounding region.

houseRules.notes:
Please note that we have a 7 day cancellation policy for all bookings made. 

In the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card.

If you do not arrive on the reserved date and fail to advise the Hostel the non-arrival charge will be the first nights accommodation.

Bed and Room Movements

Whilst every endeavour will be made to ensure you are accommodated in the same room throughout your stay, due to limited availability at time of booking, it may be necessary for you to change rooms. If applicable, you will be advised of this at check-in. You will be accommodated in a room of similar or higher standard to that originally booked. 
Due to limited availability at time of booking, multi-share accommodation for two or more guests may be provided in separate rooms. Every endeavour will be made to ensure this does not occur, but should this be necessary you will be advised at check-in.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
